amendment.description: Amendment provides additional funding for the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of Lyme Disease due to the increased threat of vector borne pathogens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 75 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to provide additional funding for the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of Lyme Disease due to the increased threat of vector borne pathogens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A069) Agreed to by recorded vote: 374 - 44 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A069) Agreed to by recorded vote: 374 - 44 (Roll no. 318).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. Delgado.
